Question
========

A null hypothesis is rejected when the exceedance probability p of the found value of the test quantity is less than

Answerlist
----------

* The critical limit Z1 - α
* The power of discernment 1 - β
* The significance level α

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The critical limit Z1 - α: Incorrect
* The discernment 1 - β: Incorrect
* The significance level α: Correct
